revision.text: {{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = SR71-A |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = September 24, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Ubiquiti_Networks_SR71-A |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0027 |subvendor_id = 0777 |subdevice_id = 4082 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = SWX-SR71 |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:15:6D |chip1 = Atheros;AR9160; |chip2 = Atheros;AR9106; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MMCX |antenna = |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = high power |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/17/2008 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B004EHWNJG |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The card pictured in the FCC internal photos is using an AR9160-AC1E (NF2964.02C, 0749, China). The presumed manuf. date code on the card is 0803 (soo.. week 3 [Jan] 2008?). :It would be classified as a '''variant 1''' card according to the criteria below. :.. the one pictured in the external photos (blue PCB, date code 0801) manuf. is obviously an older (pre-final) revision. ===noted tested card types=== *slightly pink (thin) silkscreened text on front ('''CWE ML-1 94V-0''), no back silkscreened text '''(variant 1)''' **using AR9160-AC1E (NC4538.00B, Taiwan), [http://www.ecera.com.tw/ '''eCERA'''] 40MHz crystal **reflective FEMs marked with "WN 8C1", "HC015C" **Indiv. cards: 0834 (0831, 00:15:6D:84:0X:XX, -1) *" 030", "94V-0", "4401171" silkscreened text '''(variant 2)''' **using AR9160-BC1A (N1M671.00C, China [ch1]) / AR9160-AC1E (NC4538.00B, Taiwan [ch2]) / AR9160-BC1A (N2S281.00B, Taiwan [ch3]), '''AKER''' 40MHz crystal **thick front silkscreened text **matte FEMs marked with ("WN" , "R") **Indiv. cards: ???? (0953, 00:15:6D:84:5X:XX, ch1), 1033 (1014, 00:15:6D:84:7X:XX, ch1), 1035 (1014, 00:15:6D:84:8X:XX), 1045 (1026, 00:15:6D:84:8X:XX, ch1, x3, -1), 1048 (1014, 00:15:6D:84:9X:XX, ch1), 1048 (1012, 00:15:6D:84:9X:XX, ch2), 1101 (1052, 00:15:6D:84:9X:XX, ch3, x9, +1 -1) *"CME 2M ""94V-0" (???) silkscreened text '''(variant 3)''' **using AR9160-BC1A (N4T447.05C, China [ch1]) / AR9160-BC1A (N4B032.00C, China [ch2]), '''AKER''' 40MHz crystal **thin front silkscreened text **matte FEMs marked with ("WN" , "R") **Indiv. cards: 1112 (1107, 00:15:6D:84:BX:XX), 1123 (1107, 00:15:6D:84:DX:XX, ch1), 1123 (1107, 00:15:6D:84:DX:XX, 3x, ch2) ===ath9k output per chip=== *'''AR9160-AC1E''' **NC4538.00B ***Atheros AR9160 MAC/BB Rev:0 AR5133 RF Rev:b0 *'''AR9160-BC1A''' **N2S281.00B ***Atheros AR9160 MAC/BB Rev:1 AR5133 RF Rev:b0 ===Additional specifications=== The following specs are per '''UBNT''''s datasheet for the device. {{802dot11 RxSens|11g |6M=-97 |9M= |12M= |18M= |24M= |36M=-90 |48M=-86 |54M=-84 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11a |6M=-96 |9M= |12M= |18M= |24M= |36M=-95 |48M=-94 |54M=-91 }} [[Category:English Documentation]]
